amendment.description: Amendment deletes language which prohibits from service on a public housing board any resident who has been convicted of a misdemeanor within the previous 5 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions of the bill, as amended, that would prohibit from service on a public housing tenant's board any resident who had been convicted of a misdemeanor within the previous 5 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fields (LA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
